lead_paragraph: The Yankees are Major League Baseball’s most valuable team for the 19th consecutive year, coming in at nearly triple the league’s average value, according to a survey released by Forbes.
snippet: The Yankees are Major League Baseball’s most valuable team for the 19th consecutive year, coming in at nearly triple the league’s average value, according to a survey released by Forbes.
abstract: New York Yankees are league's most valuable team for 19th consecutive year, valued at $3.4 billion; Met are sixth, valued at $1.65 billion.
